summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3691 , for the improvement of Westlake Avenue North, from Denny Way to Roy Street; by constructing concrete walks and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 45457 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
